website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for resistance training when you want to turn up the intensity without damaging the chute.
pros: Heavy-duty fabric is tear resistant and can survive extreme use without damage
Resistance can be increased or decreased depending on running speed
cons: Chute can fail to open fully at slower speeds or in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: A Very Durable Chute
customer_reviews.text: The chute didn't have any tears, scratches or intrusions anywhere on it. I did purchase the 40 inch and it does what it needs to do. Just make sure there is a long enough distance to have the chute fly outwards to give the resistance you need especially if it isn't windy. The chute is actually durable which I found out when my puppy randomly jumped on it out of no where with his nails more on the sharp side at the time. There wasn't a mark on it after the surprise attack which made me happy.
customer_reviews.author: LavezzoD

customer_reviews.title: Novel resistance training in tight lightweight package.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, novel resistance method. Being a 5'5" tennis player, the usual fixed resistance methods left me with no traction on my feet, used spiked shoes. This is perfect because I can move about freely, left, right, front, and quick turn back for lobs. No strap marks!
customer_reviews.author: Maria C Kenny, PharmD, RPh

customer_reviews.title: Great way to engage speed work.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help my son with speed work for soccer. He liked the easy setup and the ease of use. For the price it has been a good method to help him work on sprinting. Using the chute is seen as fun and cool, so he enjoys using it. The price point was fair. My son is 4'9" and I likely should have opted for the smaller chute, but I use it too. Just know that the smaller chute is best for younger kids. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Durable so far.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my sons speed training. He plays tackle, flag football and lacrosse. He trains weekly with this. We go to the park and use this in an open field.
customer_reviews.author: Sports mom

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid for youth for a great price
customer_reviews.text: The chute arrived quickly and the seller has amazing communications and provides personalized updates. You know there is a person behind them and not just some automated script. The product is the perfect size for youth and my son loves it. It provides enough resistance to increase his workout without strain. The storage/carry bag is a nice touch and very handy. A great seller and a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Weim_Momma

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: don't waste your time. I was so excited to use the chute when I received it, but it would never catch air. I tried multiple times, I had other people try and all sorts of different directions... I think it needs to be bigger in size.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my kids and their for-sport workouts. I think it will help, it has potential but it's not nearly as large or wind catching as we hoped. The material looks as though it may tear sooner then later but maybe not, it hasn't yet. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Great training
customer_reviews.text: This product helps with strength training! Recommend this for those who want to increase their core muscles and thigh muscles
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product and it shipped almost instantly. It was at my doorstep the next day. Great build quality as well. I use this not only for inline blading but also my gymnastic students to increase speed on vault runway. I certainly will be ordering from Slight Edge again. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Elliot H.

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable at all
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this for my 12 year old and the first time she ran with it, it tore. It’s not very durable at all. It was literally 10 seconds of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stalling

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my son who is a college athlete.
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Received the shoot a few days ago and already put it to use! Really well made and super durable. Love that is came with a bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used for a dog, ripped almost immediately.
customer_reviews.text: It was cool while it lasted which was about 3 minutes before it was ripped.
customer_reviews.author: I Review

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for the price. Not too much resistance was felt when running.
customer_reviews.author: Vivyn

customer_reviews.title: Durable nice value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured Helped a lot with my son playing football
customer_reviews.author: Miya Carter

customer_reviews.title: Run! Run! Forest! Run!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Grandson for football practice. He loves it so I love it! As long as he doesn't use it like a parachute off the second floor because he's watched to much of those crazy YouTube videos we are cool.
customer_reviews.author: CubaricanMami

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used it yet. But the quality looks as represented.
customer_reviews.author: Kellz Kandeez

customer_reviews.title: got for my nephew. This is his 2nd one ...
customer_reviews.text: got for my nephew. This is his 2nd one. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my son loves it. We got the small size - its perfect for him. Seems to be very durable & well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For a smaller child it needs to have shoulder harness to keep from dragging ground
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy product. Bought for my five year old to use. Uploaded a video to amazon not sure where it went. Would purchase again. NM
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This chute is great. Works great for my 9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for someone starting to develop speed and agility. Great resistance and very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but strap clip broke after 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: It works but the clip broke after the throes use. So now I have to double knot the straps around my waist
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and it has improved his speed.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as intended
customer_reviews.text: This chute doesn’t even catch air. Returning it right away
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Javaherian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cut 2 min off my 2 mile run time in 3.5 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product with nice pouch.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I like that the pouch it came in is big enough to hold this. Many times, these kind of bags rip because the product comes out of it the first time, but then is a squeeze to get back in. Product works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: ChappyPants

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He likes it, his only comments about it that were cons are that it is not super durable and kind of smaller, but it did what it was supposed to do. Shipping was fast and product came in tact.
customer_reviews.author: PaulaRannalynn

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy, doesn't always stay up when running ...
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy, doesn't always stay up when running. Need a partner to hold in the air to start off.
customer_reviews.author: marissa m.

customer_reviews.title: The product is amazing. We bought a medium and a large so ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing. We bought a medium and a large so that my son and husband could do the training together at the fields.
customer_reviews.author: Karen carter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all. Flimsy material that doesn't open to a parachute.
customer_reviews.author: megan l. snyder

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Quality is a 1star but it did get here fast. But it was very inexpensive, just be careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: ray trevino

product_meta.title: Unlimited Potential Speed Chute – Resistance Parachute - Training Parachute – Speed Chutes – Running Parachutes for Football Or Soccer with Free Carry Bag
product_meta.description:
DISCOVER A WHOLE NEW WAY OF SPEED TRAINING

Challenge Yourself

Looking to improve your speed and acceleration? Maybe even throw in some strength training in there as well? Then our speed 
parachutes are perfect for you! Unlike most exercise regimens that either target speed or resistance training, these chutes allow
you to do both simultaneously. They create between 11-33lbs of drag depending on your speed, which effectively improves stamina,
explosiveness, core strength and builds leg muscles in the process. That’s why parachute running is now widely used by pros in 
all arenas of sport.

Train Whichever Way

This isn’t your ordinary drag chute; we’ve worked with numerous athletes to design a product that is all about performance. Unlike 
other models that feature a fixed belt design only allowing you to run in one direction, our belt is fitted with a carabineer attached to
an O-ring with 360 degree rotation. So you can quickly change direction while running at high speeds- a skill that is vital in field 
sports such as football and soccer. 

Here’s what makes this exercise chute top of its class:


 - Padded waist harness that reduces the risk of injury.

 - Adjustable Velcro strap on belt to accommodate 20-42 inch waists.

 - High-grade nylon harnesses that are built for durability.

 - Easy-to-use design that doesn’t require a partner.

 - Attractive carry bag for convenient portability and storage.

Strap on this exercise parachute by Unlimited Potential and watch your speed increase with every sprint and your stamina balloon 
with every workout. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!
feature_bullets: ★ IMPROVES SPEED AND ACCELERATION: Garage Fit’s running parachute is designed to produce 11-33 pounds of resistance during sprinting to simultaneously perform speed and strength training. It effectively promotes explosiveness and stamina that is vital in field and track sports.

★ TRAIN IN ANY DIRECTION: The waist belt of the speed chute has a carabineer that connects to an O-ring with 360 degree rotation. Unlike fixed belt models, the rotation allows athletes to practice changing direction during high speed running.

★ COMFORTABLE TO WEAR: We’ve carefully padded the waist belt to reduce risk of injury and prevent bruising that is common in non-padded drag parachutes. The high quality design and strong nylon harnesses also ensures durability to last for countless workouts.

★ NO NEED FOR A PARTNER: You can easily use the resistance parachute solo, allowing you to train whenever you want. Simply wear the belt on your waist and sprint. The runners belt strap allows for adjustability between 20-42 inches, conveniently accommodating men, women, boys and girls.

★ EASY TO CARRY: This sport training parachute easily folds down to quickly fit into the included carry bag. Its lightweight design makes carrying it to the field a complete breeze, with the attractive carry bag making this a great gift for any fitness lover. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!
